message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $110 is a good start, but I'm really hoping to get it for closer to $105.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand you're looking to get the product for a bit lower. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and offer it to you for $108. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings!
